title: ADDIE Model-Based Instructional Design Workshop for Early Childhood Literacy Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of foundational educational theories and instructional design concepts
context.additional_context: Strengthening program design capabilities for improving literacy skills by applying the ADDIE model for pre-service/in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can design early literacy enhancement programs using the ADDIE model's stage-by-stage approach.
Learners can explain how to evaluate the effectiveness of an intervention program using pre-post test instruments.
Learners can propose three or more instructional strategies to improve phonological awareness, reading, writing, and reading comprehension.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
